title: mod崩溃问题
author: heiniujun
txt_content:
我玩的1.12.2mek、ae2这一类的mod，最近总是动不动就崩溃，mojang官方启动器，崩溃提示The game crashed whilst unexpected errorError: java.lang.NullPointerException: Unexpected error  崩溃报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (模组优化（1）1.12.2.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (r键整理1.12.2.jar)
  wings (翅膀1.12.2.jar)
  MekanismCoremod (通用机械1.12.2.jar)

  PPPatchingLoader (物品堆叠前置1.12.2.jar)

Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I let you down. Sorry :(
